Finally<S>3063</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, pray<S>4336</S> for<S>4012</S> us<S>2257</S>, that<S>2443</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> may have free course<S>5143</S>, and<S>2532</S> be glorified<S>1392</S>, even<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> it is with<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>: <sup>have: Gr. run</sup>
And<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> we may be delivered<S>4506</S> from<S>575</S> unreasonable<S>824</S> and<S>2532</S> wicked<S>4190</S> men<S>444</S>: for<S>1063</S> all<S>3956</S> men have not<S>3756</S> faith<S>4102</S>. <sup>unreasonable: Gr. absurd</sup>
But<S>1161</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> is<S>2076</S> faithful<S>4103</S>, who<S>3739</S> shall stablish<S>4741</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> keep<S>5442</S> you from<S>575</S> evil<S>4190</S>.
And<S>1161</S> we have confidence<S>3982</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> touching<S>1909</S> you<S>5209</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye both<S>2532</S> do<S>4160</S> and<S>2532</S> will do<S>4160</S> the things which<S>3739</S> we command<S>3853</S> you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> direct<S>2720</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S> into<S>1519</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> into<S>1519</S> the patient waiting<S>5281</S> for Christ<S>5547</S>. <sup>patient: or, patience of Christ</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> we command<S>3853</S> you<S>5213</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, that ye withdraw<S>4724</S> yourselves<S>5209</S> from<S>575</S> every<S>3956</S> brother<S>80</S> that walketh<S>4043</S> disorderly<S>814</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> after<S>2596</S> the tradition<S>3862</S> which<S>3739</S> he received<S>3880</S> of<S>3844</S> us<S>2257</S>.
For<S>1063</S> yourselves<S>846</S> know<S>1492</S> how<S>4459</S> ye ought<S>1163</S> to follow<S>3401</S> us<S>2248</S>: for<S>3754</S> we behaved<S>812</S> not<S>3756</S> ourselves disorderly<S>812</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>;
Neither<S>3761</S> did we eat<S>5315</S> any man's<S>3844</S> <S>5100</S> bread<S>740</S> for nought<S>1432</S>; but<S>235</S> wrought<S>2038</S> with<S>1722</S> labour<S>2873</S> and<S>2532</S> travail<S>3449</S> night<S>3571</S> and<S>2532</S> day<S>2250</S>, that<S>4314</S> we might<S>1912</S> not<S>3361</S> be chargeable<S>1912</S> to any<S>5100</S> of you<S>5216</S>:
Not<S>3756</S> because<S>3754</S> we have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> power<S>1849</S>, but<S>235</S> to<S>2443</S> make<S>1325</S> ourselves<S>1438</S> an ensample<S>5179</S> unto you<S>5213</S> to<S>1519</S> follow<S>3401</S> us<S>2248</S>.
For<S>1063</S> even<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> we were<S>2258</S> with<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, this<S>5124</S> we commanded<S>3853</S> you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> if any<S>1536</S> would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> work<S>2038</S>, neither<S>3366</S> should he eat<S>2068</S>.
For<S>1063</S> we hear<S>191</S> that there are some<S>5100</S> which walk<S>4043</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> disorderly<S>814</S>, working<S>2038</S> not at all<S>3367</S>, but<S>235</S> are busybodies<S>4020</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> them that are such<S>5108</S> we command<S>3853</S> and<S>2532</S> exhort<S>3870</S> by<S>1223</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, that<S>2443</S> with<S>3326</S> quietness<S>2271</S> they work<S>2038</S>, and eat<S>2068</S> their own<S>1438</S> bread<S>740</S>.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, be<S>1573</S> not<S>3361</S> weary<S>1573</S> in well doing<S>2569</S>. <sup>be: or, faint not</sup>
And<S>1161</S> if any man<S>1536</S> obey<S>5219</S> not<S>3756</S> our<S>2257</S> word<S>3056</S> by<S>1223</S> this epistle<S>1992</S>, note<S>4593</S> that<S>5126</S> man, and<S>2532</S> have<S>4874</S> no<S>3361</S> company with<S>4874</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>2443</S> he may be ashamed<S>1788</S>. <sup>by: or, signify that man by an epistle</sup>
Yet<S>2532</S> count<S>2233</S> him not<S>3361</S> as<S>5613</S> an enemy<S>2190</S>, but<S>235</S> admonish<S>3560</S> him as<S>5613</S> a brother<S>80</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> of peace<S>1515</S> himself<S>846</S> give<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> peace<S>1515</S> always<S>1223</S> <S>3956</S> by<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> means<S>5158</S>. The Lord<S>2962</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>.
The salutation<S>783</S> of Paul<S>3972</S> with mine own<S>1699</S> hand<S>5495</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> the token<S>4592</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> epistle<S>1992</S>: so<S>3779</S> I write<S>1125</S>.
The grace<S>5485</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>The second<S>1208</S> epistle to<S>4314</S> the Thessalonians<S>2331</S> was written<S>1125</S> from<S>575</S> Athens<S>116</S>.</sup>
